item.title: ITC Hotels demerger to come into effect from January 1, 2025 - The Economic Times
item.description:
ITC Hotels Demerger to Take Effect on January 1, 2025

Publication Date: Tuesday
Source: Kolkata-based ITC

ITC announced that the demerger of ITC Hotels will take effect from January 1, 2025, following approvals from the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT).

  • The NCLT approved the scheme in October.
  • All conditions for the demerger have been fulfilled as of December 16.
  • Shareholders approved the demerger in June, and the Competition Commission of India cleared it in May.
  • ITC will maintain 40% ownership of ITC Hotels; shareholders receive the remaining 60% based on their stakes.
  • ITC Hotels reported a 12.1% revenue growth in the September quarter.
“ITC Limited and ITC Hotels Limited have mutually acknowledged that all the conditions specified... have been fulfilled.”

This move positions ITC Hotels as a separate entity, ready for growth with a focused business strategy.

item.title: Ripple reveals official launch for RLUSD, XRP eyes new all-time high at $4.75 - FXStreet
item.description:
Ripple Launches RLUSD Stablecoin; XRP Eyes $4.75 High

Date: December 16, 2024 | Source: FXStreet

Ripple has officially announced that its RLUSD stablecoin will launch on December 17, 2024, with expectations of advancing XRP’s price towards an all-time high.

  • Ripple's RLUSD stablecoin will launch on multiple platforms including MoonPay, Uphold, and others.
  • XRP is projected to possibly reach a new all-time high of $4.75 following regulatory approvals.
  • Monica Long, Ripple's president, highlighted the significance of RLUSD's introduction for XRP Ledger.
The release of RLUSD marks a new chapter – both for the XRP Ledger, as well as @Ripple for use in our $70B+ payments flows. — Monica Long (@MonicaLongSF) December 16, 2024

The RLUSD stablecoin is designed to maintain a peg with the US dollar, supporting cross-border applications.

item.title: Here is why December 26 is an important session for NTPC Green Energy shares - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Importance of December 26 for NTPC Green Energy Shares

Date: Dec 16, 2024 | Source: CNBC TV18

The article discusses why December 26 is significant for NTPC Green Energy shares, focusing on the end of the one-month lock-in period for shareholders.

  • NTPC Green's ₹10,000 crore IPO was subscribed 2.55 times.
  • The stock has been trading around ₹140.75, down 0.7% in the recent session.
  • On December 26, 18.3 crore shares will be free for trading, amounting to 2% of the outstanding equity.
  • The three-month lock-in period will end on February 24, 2025, releasing another 18.3 crore shares.
  • NTPC Green shares listed at a premium to ₹108 and are currently consolidating around ₹155.
"The end of a lock-in period does not mean that all of those shares will be sold in the open market, but will only become eligible to be traded."

This upcoming session could impact NTPC Green Energy's stock performance significantly as new shares become available for trading.

item.title: Zomato, Swiggy shares in focus as GST council considers cutting food delivery GST to 5% - The Economic Times
item.description:
Zomato, Swiggy shares in focus as GST council considers cutting food delivery GST to 5%

Publication Date: Not specified Source: The Economic Times

Shares of food-delivery companies Zomato and Swiggy are likely to remain in focus as the GST council may reduce the tax on food delivery charges to 5%, effective January 1, 2024.

  • The GST council plans to lower the tax on food delivery from 18% to 5%.
  • This potential change would not allow food delivery platforms to claim tax credits.
  • Zomato shares closed 2% higher at Rs 294.25, while Swiggy shares rose 11.7% to Rs 594.80.
  • Axis Capital has set a target price of Rs 640 for Swiggy, citing growth opportunities.
  • Swiggy shares have increased by 41.6% since their listing price of Rs 420.
  • Zomato shares have risen by 138% over the past year.
“The food-delivery and Q-com businesses remain underpenetrated, with a long growth runway.”

The proposed tax cut could significantly impact the operations of food delivery services, helping to make them more competitive.

item.title: MobiKwik, Vishal Mega Mart, Sai Life Sciences IPOs: Allotments finalised, check listing date and time - Upstox
item.description:
MobiKwik, Vishal Mega Mart, Sai Life Sciences IPOs: Allotments finalised, check listing date and time

Publication Date: December 16
Source: Unknown

The IPO allotments for MobiKwik, Vishal Mega Mart, and Sai Life Sciences have been finalized. Investors can check their share allotment status online.

Listing Date and Time

Shares will be listed on December 18 at 10 am.

MobiKwik IPO

The public offer was subscribed 119.38 times. The price range is ₹265-₹279.

  • QIBs: 119.50
  • NIIs: 108.95
  • RIIs: 134.67
  • Total: 119.38

Vishal Mega Mart IPO

The IPO received 27.28 times subscription. Price band is ₹74-₹78.

  • QIBs: 80.75
  • NIIs: 14.25
  • RIIs: 2.31
  • Total: 27.28

Sai Life Sciences IPO

The IPO was subscribed 10.26 times with varying subscriptions among different investor categories.

Learn more about IPO listings at this page.

item.title: Kia Syros 5th Official Teaser Video Out, New Details Revealed - GaadiWaadi.com
item.description:
Kia Syros 5th Official Teaser Video Out, New Details Revealed

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Gaadi Waadi

Kia India has unveiled a new teaser video showcasing the upcoming Kia Syros SUV, set for its world premiere on December 19, 2024.

  • The Syros will be offered with petrol and diesel engine options.
  • First deliveries are expected to start in February 2025.
  • The SUV will feature a unique design with vertical LED headlamps and an aggressive front fascia.
  • Dimensions indicate it will be larger than the Hyundai Casper.
  • The interior will include premium features like a dual-pane panoramic sunroof and a large touchscreen infotainment system.
  • Safety features are expected to include 6 airbags and a Level 2 ADAS suite.
This SUV will slot between the Seltos and Sonet in the Indian market.

The Kia Syros aims to offer both modern design and advanced technology, indicating a strong entry into the competitive SUV segment.

item.title: IKS Health IPO share allotment today as GMP crosses ₹400: Steps to check status on NSE, BSE and Link Intime - CNBCTV18
item.description:
IKS Health IPO Share Allotment Today as GMP Surpasses ₹400

Publication Date: December 17, 2023 | Source: Various

The Jhunjhunwala family-backed Inventurus Knowledge Solutions Ltd. (IKS Health) is finalizing the share allotment status for its IPO today. The IPO, which raised ₹2,498 crores, saw a subscription rate of 52.68 times.

  • The IPO was open for subscription from December 12 to December 16.
  • Total applications received: 54.6 crore shares against 1.03 crore shares offered.
  • Non-Institutional Investors oversubscribed 23.25 times, retail investors 14.55 times, and institutional investors 80.64 times.
  • Share allotment status can be checked on BSE, NSE, and Link Intime websites.
  • Successful bidders will receive shares in their Demat accounts on December 18, with refunds processed on the same day.
  • Expected listing date on NSE and BSE is December 19.
  • The grey market premium (GMP) indicates a listing price potential of ₹1,704 per share, suggesting a gain of 30.47% over the IPO's upper price band.
"However, investors must note that GMP is speculative and may not be a true reflection of how the stock performs in reality."

In conclusion, the IKS Health IPO has generated significant investor interest, and those who applied can check their allotment status online.

item.title: Vishal Mega Mart IPO Allotment Out: Know Latest GMP, How To Check Allotment Status Online - News18
item.description:
Vishal Mega Mart IPO Allotment Out: Latest GMP and How to Check Allotment Status

Last Updated: December 17, 2024, 06:56 IST

The Vishal Mega Mart IPO allotment has been finalized, with investors receiving bank debit messages. The latest GMP stands at 24.36%, indicating a decent listing gain for investors.

  • IPO opened for subscription from December 11 to December 13 and was subscribed 28.75 times.
  • Retail investors subscribed 2.43 times, NII 15.01 times, and QIB 85.11 times.
  • The IPO price band was set at Rs 74 to Rs 78 per share.
  • Vishal Mega Mart's unlisted shares are currently trading at Rs 98.5 in the grey market.
  • The listing is scheduled for December 18 on BSE and NSE.
“The Vishal Mega Mart IPO has generated significant buzz with its robust subscription numbers and decent GMP.”

Investors can check their allotment status on BSE and NSE websites or Kfin Technologies’ portal.

This IPO reflects strong investor interest and confidence in the retail market.

item.title: Gold Rate Today In India: Check 22 Carat Price In Your City On December 16 - News18
item.description:
Gold Rate Today In India: Check 22 and 24 carat gold prices in different cities on December 16, 2024

Last Updated: December 16, 2024, 19:14 IST

As of December 16, gold prices in India remained high. The cost of 24-carat gold was Rs 77,890 per 10 grams, while 22-carat gold was priced at Rs 71,400 per 10 grams.

Key Points:

  • 24-carat gold price: Rs 77,890 per 10 grams.
  • 22-carat gold price: Rs 71,400 per 10 grams.
  • Silver was trading at Rs 92,500 per kilogram.
  • Prices vary by city; for example, in Delhi, 22-carat gold is Rs 71,550.
  • Gold prices in India are influenced by international market rates, import duties, taxes, and currency exchange fluctuations.

Conclusion:

Gold prices show stability amidst fluctuating market dynamics, reflecting its cultural and economic significance in India.

item.title: AI Picks THIS Brazilian Model As The Perfect Female Body: Do You Know AI’s Defination Of Perfection? - NewsX
item.description:
AI Names Brazilian Model Karol Rosalin as Ideal Female Body

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: NewsX

The AI has designated Brazilian fitness influencer Karol Rosalin as having the 'perfect female body,' lauding her symmetry and fitness achievements. Rosalin attributes her success to disciplined training and specific dietary choices.

  • Karol Rosalin is recognized for her symmetry, health, and fitness by AI systems from Playboy Australia.
  • Rosalin achieved a ‘perfect 10’ rating based on AI analysis of her physical attributes.
  • Her fitness journey began eight years ago, focusing on strength training five days a week and daily aerobic exercises.
  • She maintains a balanced diet featuring natural ingredients.
  • Expert opinions suggest genetics and lifestyle are crucial in determining body shape and perception of perfection.
“Already, seeing the results in the mirror is a victory. Being recognized as the ‘Perfect Fitness Woman’ is incredible!” - Karol Rosalin

This recognition underscores the subjective nature of beauty and fitness standards, which vary among individuals.

item.title: Stock Split + Bonus Issue: Multibagger stock 8000% Return in 2 Years! RIL, and Tata among clients – Check record dates - ET Now
item.description:
Stock Split + Bonus Issue: 8000% Return in 2 Years!

Updated: Dec 17, 2024 Source: ET NOW

Bharat Global Developers, a multibagger stock, has recently announced a bonus share issuance and a stock split, resulting in an astounding return of 8006% in the past two years.

  • The stock returned 2619% in the previous year and has risen by 2133.38% in 2024.
  • The company boasts a strong order book exceeding Rs 1500 crores.
  • It has secured key contracts from Reliance Industries, Tata Agro, McCain India, and has international orders through its Dubai subsidiary.
Bharat Global Developers engages in infrastructure operations, including property acquisition, construction, and the sourcing of agricultural and consumer goods.

The firm has set the record date for the bonus share issuance and stock split as December 26, pending shareholder approval.
